summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for a specific account from April 1, 2018, to April 30, 2018. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, highlighting a significant outgoing transfer to an individual named Bella Klein.

keyFacts: The document details account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from April 1, 2018, to April 30, 2018.
A significant outgoing transfer of $100,000.00 was made to Bella Klein on April 11, 2018.
An incoming transfer of $30,000.00 was recorded on April 20, 2018.
Stewart Oldfield is listed as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.
The document includes various service charges and fees associated with the account.
